==Lore==
According to the quest [[No Restoring This Past Land of Beauty]], Tianqiu Valley was once a prosperous settlement at some point in the ancient past. As to how it came to be the way it is now, it seems to have had something to do with the rampage of an [[Azhdaha|ancient dragon king]]. There aren't a lot of details available about that incident, but legend has it that [[Rex Lapis]] and his [[adepti]] eventually imprisoned it within some sort of adepti realm. Its servants then fled into the depths of the earth and entered a deep slumber, waiting for the day when the dragon king would rise again.
